title: Classic Power Tools
description: From workshop saws to electric drills, test your knowledge of dad's favorite tools

questions.question: What brand, sold exclusively through Sears stores, became America's most popular line of hand and power tools?
What power tool, introduced by Black & Decker in 1961, was the first cordless electric drill for consumers?

What popular TV show host, known for building things in his workshop, inspired millions to take up woodworking as a hobby?
options: Norm Abram on This Old House
